pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Pro Intensive Firming Day Cream
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Powered by Bakuchiol, a natural alternative to Retinol, and Hyaluronic Acid, this high-performance moisturiser is clinically proven to visibly firm and plump skin in just 14 days.  Boosted with Red Bell Pepper Extract to help protect against blue light induced ageing.  

Warnings

This product contains natural active ingredients. Patch testing and gradual introduction is recommended. If irritation occurs reduce frequency or discontinue use & seek medical advice. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. 

Common Uses

98% of users saw a visible improvement in the appearance and condition of their skin. *using total Purely Ageless PRO range

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Coco-caprylate, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Bakuchiol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Extract (Red Bell Pepper), Davidsonia Jerseyana Fruit Extract (Davidson Plum), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Xanthan Gum,  Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Salicylate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Linalool**, Citronellol**, Limonene**, Geraniol**. *Natural Fragrance **Component of Natural Fragrance

Directions

APPLICATION: In the morning, massage a small amount onto freshly cleansed face, neck and decolletage using a gentle upward motion.
